output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - CMF 11240017 is present, indicating this is electoral propaganda material.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes - explicitly mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" who is a presidential candidate (Position 3 - PSD).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - It's a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram - Uses broad messaging addressing voters in general - Has reached between 2,000-2,999 impressions
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Directly calls for votes ("votați Marcel Ciolacu - președinte!") - Uses campaign messaging about values and leadership - Clear campaign slogan structure and appeal to voters
5. Journalism: No - This is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content - Contains direct call to action for voting - Includes campaign messaging and CMF number
6. Personal opinion: No - This is a structured campaign message - Paid advertisement with clear electoral intent - Contains official campaign elements (CMF number, formal structure)

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains CMF number - Direct call to vote for a specific presidential candidate - Paid advertisement reaching thousands - Clear campaign messaging and structure - Posted during the period when presidential campaign propaganda is prohibited
conclusion.message-for-police: Infomed Pro SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin publicarea și promovarea unei reclame platite pe Facebook si Instagram (ID: 599690146053145) care continua propaganda electorala pentru candidatul prezidential Marcel Ciolacu dupa incheierea perioadei legale de campanie. Postarea contine un indemn direct la vot ("votați Marcel Ciolacu - președinte!"), foloseste un numar CMF (11240017), si are caracter vadit propagandistic electoral, fiind promovata activ dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Impactul electoral este evident prin atingerea unui public de 2000-2999 persoane prin promovare platita, reprezentand o incercare clara de influentare a votului in perioada in care propaganda electorala este interzisa prin lege.
